krpano.title: Virtual Tour

layer.name: dg_info
layer.html: [/br] OBJEKT : 3D-Beispielbegehung [/br] [/br] TYP : Dachgeschosswohnung[/br] [/br] ETAGE : Dachgeschoss[/br] [/br] RÄUME : 3[/br][/br] WOHNFLÄCHE : ca. 84,85 m²[/br][/br] KONTAKT : +49(69)87004000[/br] [/br] info@3-visions.com[/br][/br]

scene.name: scene_DG_Flur
scene.title: DG_Flur
scene.action: changeCombo(); set(layer[activespot].parent, map); set(layer[radar].parent,DG_Flur); set(layer[radar].heading, 00.00 );set(Layer[DG_Scene_Name].html,Flur - Eingang);

krpano.action: set(layer[map].onclick, closemap(); ); layer[map].changeorigin(center,center); set(bigscale,0.75); if(layer[map].imagewidth GT stagewidth, div(bigscale, stagewidth, layer[map].imagewidth); ); tween(layer[map].x, 0); tween(layer[map].y, 0); tween(layer[map].scale, get(bigscale));
set(layer[map].onclick, openmap(); ); layer[map].changeorigin(leftbottom,leftbottom); tween(layer[map].x, 0); tween(layer[map].y, 0); tween(layer[map].scale, 0.75);
